about_the_game:
The Emperor and State has been in development for many years and is now available in Early Access. We appreciate your continuous support. The game is still being updated, and if you enjoy it, welcome to get the Supporter Pack to help with further development and receive some digital gifts.

Contents of the Supporter Pack:

  • Supporter Badge in the main menu
  • Golden Roof Hall of Affair
  • Three wearable crowns
  • Special User Interface
  • Supporter Role on Discord (Please join our and contact the admin Mystletaine to receive it)
  • Heartfelt thanks from the development team

Please note, this Supporter Pack is meant to show your support for the Developer Team. The above content is just a small token of our appreciation prepared for you.
